mapper.select:
select wp.id, wp.work_name, wp.work_content, wp.work_instructor, wp.work_minutes, wp.create_time, wp.update_time from work_pool as wp
wp.id not in ( select work_id from work_schedule_detail as wsd where schedule_id=#{scheduleId})
and wp.work_from='w3' and wp.user_id=#{userId}
and wp.work_name like "%"#{workName}"%"
and wp.delete_status='no' and wp.audit_status='agree'
order by update_time desc ,create_time desc

select count(*) from work_pool as wp
wp.user_id=#{employeeId}
and wp.work_name like "%"#{workName}"%"
and wp.delete_status='no'

select count(*) from work_pool wp left join usermanagement.`users` on wp.user_id=`users`.id
work_from='w3'
and users.id=#{employeeId}
and wp.work_name like "%"#{workName}"%"
and wp.delete_status='no' and wp.audit_status='agree'
